Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 86th overall pick, by Troy in 1979...
Injured on 4/20/1981 with a Fractured Hip, out for 7 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Steven Driggers (CI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/1985, off Blaine Childs (WT)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/7/1989, hitting .563 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Won World Championship with Troy in 1989...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Capital City on 5/29/1990...
Injured on 5/27/1991 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
